attributes.action: Only allow people who have lived and worked in the UK for 2 years to recieve job seekers allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time the Government stop wasting tax payers money on people who come straight out of school and go on the dole and don't work a day in their life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
